title: H0517| House | for | Sale | Boralesgamuwa
details:
DESCRIPTION
It is a four bed roomed spacious house situated in Boralesgamuwa & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, four bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, an elegant pantry with fitted cupboards.

LOCATION
House is located in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location Embillawatta Road, Boralesgamuwa & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc.etc, it is only about thirty minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.
